name: ASCENT #01: The Beginning
description:
ASCENT
An audiovisual voyage based on the works by AddySpacer.

The Beginning:
From the moment I saw AddySpacer’s "Descent - Idolatry of the Unseeing", I have been seeing images in my head that I couldn’t shake off. The editions were all sold out and it bothered me so much that I wanted to make a fan art out of it. I was working on Spaceboy at that time and this idea came up that perhaps I should translate my vision into a tribute to one of the most interesting works of art I have seen since I first started my journey into NFT.

Join me in this episodic storytelling as I take his iconic spaceman into a metaphorical ascension, bringing his towering skeletal creations to life.
